name: HelpAging
goal:
HelpAging is a consultancy firm that provides consultation on health and heath care topics such as medical device and drug portfolio analysis, mobile health technology, telemedecine, teleconsultation and pharmaeconomics assessment for pharma industry, insurance and investors as well as services and consultations around telemedecine, teleconsultation, mobile health telemonitoring and mobile health lifestyle coaching for the healthcare system.
HelpAging is also an expert in health liability.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Healthy and active ageing
Silver economy in Europe
EIPAHA
Healthy living
